comment.author: 32162360@N00
comment._content: What a great photo.  I would not have thought Broken Hill was that civilized in 1908 - stone buildings, steam trams, park with bandstand, Amcoorie tea  etc ...

comment.author: 86916510@N00
comment._content: It looks a bit like a museum diorama for some reason?

comment.author: 23682239@N07
comment._content: The people on the corner liked their privacy, didn't they? Or was it an early example of selling the naming rights to their fence?
